      • compare

        public static java.lang.String compare(int[] _distances)
        Returns the string specifying the largest element in the int array which ranges from 0 to length().
        Parameters:
        _distances - int array.
        Returns:
        a string indicating the largest element in the array (NOT zero based, hence +1).
